Call Description: Sets the state of the tournament to start accepting predictions. Your tournament's 'prediction_method' attribute must be set to 1 (exponential scoring) or 2 (linear scoring) to use this option. Note: Once open for predictions; match records will be persisted; so participant additions and removals will no longer be permitted.
Parameter Description: 0 or 1; includes an array of associated participant records
0 or 1; includes an array of associated match records
